short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display nodei.co npm badges on GitHub README files for Node.js packages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Each time you visit the GitHub page for a Node.js package published in npm you will see nodei.co badges displayed above the README.

See last publish, number of dependencies and dependents, number of stars and number of downloads. Also see a download graph for the last 6 months.
